recommended_degree: Analis Keuangan, Akuntansi, Akuntansi Keuangan, Akuntansi Bisnis Digital, Akuntansi Keuangan Publik (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
* Follow up with users regarding incomplete expense documents.
* Check the completeness of Vendor Bill documents (invoice, delivery order, bank account details, stamp duty, etc.).
* Follow up with the Procurement Department for missing Vendor Bill documents.
* Verify the completeness of credit card transaction documents (invoice, receipt, proof of payment, refund documents, etc.).
* Follow up on outstanding credit card transaction documents that have not been submitted (via email or in person).
* Follow up on outstanding Accounts Receivable (AR).
* Respond to student/parent emails regarding tuition fee confirmation and proof of payment requests.
* Coordinate with the Supervisor (SPV) and Head of Department (HoD).
* Generate the monthly initial budget report.
* Create Budgetary Position for new budget allocations (projects).
* Create Budget Control for new budget allocations (projects).
* Provide supporting documents for the external audit process.
